comment: Peirce's axiom ~ peirce implies Curry's axiom over minimal implicational calculus and the axiomatic definition of disjunction ( ~ olc , ~ orc , ~ jao ). See comment of ~ bj-currypeirce . (Contributed by BJ, 15-Jun-2021.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
